alert.note: Alert for Webb (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 13 at 5:15AM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Webb County through 615 AM CDT... At 515 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Ranchitos Las Lomas to 11 miles south of Columbia Bridge. Movement was north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Laredo, Texas A&M, Laredo International Airport, Botines, Ranchitos Las Lomas, Unitec Industrial Park, Doctors Hospital Of Laredo, Laredo Country Club, Ranchos Penitas West, Orvil, Columbia Bridge and Callaghan. This includes the following highways... Interstate 35 between mile markers 1 and 28. US Highway 59 between mile markers 800 and 824. US Highway 83 between mile markers 690 and 698. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
